required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study Evaluating Enzalutamide Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics, and Related Changes After Drug Switch
clinical_study.official_title: A Clinical Study for Evaluating Enzalutamide Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics, and Related Changes After Drug Switch in Chinese Patients With Metastatic Castration-Resistant Prostate Cancer

lead_sponsor.agency: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a study for evaluating enzalutamide pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics, and related changes after drug switch in Chinese patients with metastatic castration-resistant prostate cancer. The study primary objective is to evaluate the pharmacokinetic characteristics of enzalutamide in Chinese patients with mCRPC.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose of the study drug to 12 weeks after dose
From the first dose of the study drug to 12 weeks after dose

primary_outcome.measure: Area under curve from time 0 to 24h (AUC0-24h)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose of the study drug to 12 weeks after dose

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From 13 weeks to 24 weeks after dose
From 13 weeks to 24 weeks after dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under curve from time 0 to 24h (AUC0-24h)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From 13 weeks to 24 weeks after dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose of the study drug to 24 weeks after dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of patients with > 50% decrease in prostate specific antigen (PSA)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose of the study drug to 12 weeks after dose
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients with > 50% decrease in PSA levels from baseline at weeks1,3,5 6, 8, 10, and 12.

facility.name: Medical Ethics Committee of Hunan Cancer Hospital
